summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation and special handling charges for services rendered on March 2, 2001. It includes payment details, charges, and references to various shipments associated with individuals and entities at a specific address in New York.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is listed as a payor for one of the shipments detailed in the invoice.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: Packages were picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: Multiple packages were delivered on this date, with signers noted.

events.title: Invoice Issuance
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice for services rendered, detailing charges and payment information.

keyFacts: The invoice details transportation and special handling charges totaling $139.00.
Multiple individuals are listed as payors for various shipments.
Packages were picked up on March 2, 2001, and delivered on March 8, 2001.
Signatures from individuals are noted for the delivery of packages.
The invoice includes important service messages regarding handling surcharges effective April 16, 2001.
